channel.title: intro on michael s.
channel.description: Recent content in intro on michael s.

item.title: Timing Is Everything
item.description: And I guess the question is “Why now?”. I’ve been loathe to start one of these things for a number of reasons and they normally fall into this order: What do I really have to say? Why would anyone care what I have to say? What if people don’t like/care about what I have to say? Can I be bothered to go through the effort of making a website? The answer to the first question is a very succinct “not a huge amount”.
